# About

::: {style="text-align: justify"}
An alumnus of the Christian Medical College Vellore, Dr. Ramakrishna joined the faculty of CMC, and retired as the Head of the Department of **Gastrointestinal Sciences**. He has also worked for several years abroad, in Australia, Bahrain and the USA. In 2013, he joined the SIMS Hospital.
